thread.title: Vettah to start filming from October 7
thread.title_full: Vettah to start filming from October 7 - The Times of India

author: Sanjith Sidhardhan
title: Vettah to start filming from October 7
text:
Rajesh Pillai's Vettah will kick off filming from October 7 at Ernakulam. The movie has Manju Warrier, Indrajith and Kunchacko Boban playing the three important roles in the psycho-thriller scripted by Arunlal Ramachandran.
Indrajith and Kunchacko Boban will join the sets on October 12. The film also has Bhamaa, Prem Prakash, Kottayam Nazir and Vijayaraghavan in supporting roles.
Vettah will be Rajesh Pillai's return to thrillers after the superhit Traffic . His last movie was Milli , which had Amala Paul and Nivin Pauly in the lead.
